data.title: Republic Airways
data.text:
Dear Applicants:

Republic has become aware of one or more individuals that claim to be “recruiting” Flight Attendants to fly for Republic and its subsidiary airlines in the United Kingdom and possibly other locations. Those are fraudulent claims. The persons making them do not represent and are not affiliated with, our Company. Republic does not fly in the UK, and it does not hire flight attendants through outside recruiters. Please do not respond to any such solicitation, and do not send money to any purported recruiter or travel councilor or agency.

Republic itself is recruiting for several positions through the listings on our website, www.rjet.com. Our website is the only way to apply for a flight attendant position with Republic, and no payments to anyone are required to apply or to obtain a position. Click on Employment and follow the links to apply for any position in which you are interested.

Republic Airways Holdings Inc.
